mapper.select:
select plant||VBILLCODE||VBILLROWNO from bts_erpdelivery where (plant,VBILLCODE,VBILLROWNO) in
(#{plant}, #{VBILLCODE}, #{VBILLROWNO})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bts_erpdelivery(plant, MATERIAL, MATDESCRIPTION, MATSPEC, CUSCODE, CUSDESCRIPTION, BILLTYPENAME, VBILLCODE, VBILLDATE, VBILLDTYPE, VBILLDPNAME, VBILLDDNAME, VBILLVDEF2, VBILLROWNO, VBILLDNUM, VBILLDUNAME, DELIVERYNUM, STATUS, CREATETIME, CREATEUSER) VALUES
(#{item.plant},#{item.material},#{item.matdescription},#{item.matspec},#{item.cuscode},#{item.cusdescription},#{item.billtypename},#{item.vbillcode}, #{item.vbilldate},#{item.vbilldtype},#{item.vbilldpname},#{item.vbillddname},#{item.vbillvdef2},#{item.vbillrowno},#{item.vbilldnum},#{item.vbillduname}, #{item.deliverynum},#{item.status},#{item.createtime},#{item.createuser})
mapper.update:
update bts_erpdelivery set STATUS = '30' where (plant,VBILLCODE,VBILLROWNO) in
(#{plant}, #{VBILLCODE}, #{VBILLROWNO})
